name: Boss Slayer (Bahadir1)
description:
This game was made in a month for BossRushJam2023.

Grab Your Weapon And Kill Every Boss In Your Way!

THEME

- Game giving you makeshift upgrades!

CONTROLS

1) WASD  -> Movement

 2) Shift -> Dash

 3) 1-2-3-4-5 -> Change Weapon

 4) Left Click -> Shoot

ASSETS ( FOR SOUNDS )

 1) https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/world/middle-east-music-pack-2...

 2) https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/pirate-music-pack-232467

 3) MadRooster Sound Library
